crud¶

app.crud.authenticate_user(db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session, email: str, password: str)[source]¶

Authenticate a user.

Parameters:

  • db (Session) – Database session.

  • email (str) – User’s email address.

  • password (str) – User’s password.

Returns:

Authenticated user if credentials are correct, None otherwise.

Return type:

models.User

Parameters:

  • db (Session) – Database session.

  • contact (schemas.ContactCreate) – Contact creation data.

  • user_id (int) – ID of the owner user.

Returns:

The created contact.

Return type:

models.Contact

app.crud.delete_contact(db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session, contact_id: int, user_id: int)[source]¶

Delete a contact by ID.

Parameters:

  • db (Session) – Database session.

  • contact_id (int) – ID of the contact.

  • user_id (int) – ID of the owner user.

app.crud.get_contact(db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session, contact_id: int, user_id: int)[source]¶

  • contact_id (int) – ID of the contact.

  • user_id (int) – ID of the owner user.

Returns:

The retrieved contact.

Return type:

models.Contact

app.crud.get_contacts(db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 10, search: str = None, user_id: int = None)[source]¶

Retrieve a list of contacts.

Parameters:

  • db (Session) – Database session.

  • skip (int) – Number of contacts to skip.

  • limit (int) – Maximum number of contacts to return.

  • search (str) – Search query for contacts.

  • user_id (int) – ID of the owner user.

Returns:

List of contacts.

Return type:

List[models.Contact]

  • email (str) – User’s email address.

Returns:

User object if found, None otherwise.

app.crud.update_user_avatar(db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session, user_id: int, avatar_url: str)[source]¶

Update a user’s avatar URL.

Parameters:

  • db (Session) – Database session.

  • user_id (int) – User’s ID.

  • avatar_url (str) – URL of the new avatar.

Returns:

User object with updated avatar URL if found, None otherwise.

Return type:

models.User
